description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 12/13/2006

Thorne thanks Taylor for getting Eric and Stephanie’s relationship back on track. Later, Eric tells Ridge and Thorne that they cannot cut corners starting their new fashion business. Thorne tells Eric and Ridge of Taylor’s plan to get Forrester Creations back from Nick. Phoebe refuses to testify against Shane and gets Lt. Baker to drop the charges against him.  Later, Phoebe visits Shane as Bridget treats his injuries.  Phoebe tells Shane the good news; he doesn’t have to run anymore.  Shane is grateful and they share a kiss in front of a skeptical Bridget.  An upset Ridge finds out that the charges against Shane have been dropped and doesn’t want Shane involved in his daughter’s life. As Taylor counsels Nick, he insists he has no secrets but thoughts of his past come back to distract him.
